monster.name: Cultist 1
monster.traits:
Skills: Deception +2, Religion +2 Senses: Passive perception 10 Languages: Any one language
Dark Devotion: Advantage on ST against being charmed or frightened.

monster.name: Cultist 2
monster.traits:
Skills: Deception +2, Religion +2 Senses: Passive perception 10 Languages: Any one language
Dark Devotion: Advantage on ST against being charmed or frightened.

monster.name: Cult Fanatic 1
monster.traits:
Skills: Deception +4, Persuasion +4, Religion +2 Senses: Passive perception 11 Languages: Any one language
Dark Devotion: Advantage on ST against being charmed or frightened.
monster.weapons: Multiattack: x2 melee. Dagger: +4 to hit, 5ft or 20/60. 1d4+2 piercing.
monster.spells:
4th-level spellcaster, spell save DC 11, +3 to hit.
Cantrips: Light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy 1st level x 4: Command, inflict wounds, shield of faith 2nd level x 3: Hold person, spiritual weapon

monster.name: Cult Fanatic 2
monster.traits:
Skills: Deception +4, Persuasion +4, Religion +2 Senses: Passive perception 11 Languages: Any one language
Dark Devotion: Advantage on ST against being charmed or frightened.
monster.weapons: Multiattack: x2 melee. Dagger: +4 to hit, 5ft or 20/60. 1d4+2 piercing.
monster.spells:
4th-level spellcaster, spell save DC 11, +3 to hit.
Cantrips: Light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy 1st level x 4: Command, inflict wounds, shield of faith 2nd level x 3: Hold person, spiritual weapon

monster.name: Warlock of the Fiend
monster.traits:
Saving Throws: Wis +4, Cha +7 Skills: Arcana +4, Deception +7, Persuasion +7, Religion +4 Resistances: Slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons Senses: Darkvision 60ft, passive perception 11 Languages: Any two language
Innate spellcasting, DC15: At will:Alter self, false life, levitate (self only), mage armour (self only), silent image 1/Day: Feeblemind, finger of death, plane shift
monster.weapons: Mace: +3 to hit, 5ft. 1d6 bludgeoning plus 3d6 fire damage
monster.spells:
17th level spellcaster, DC 15, +7 to hit.
Cantrips: Eldritch blast, fire bolt, friends, mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation, shocking grasp 1st-5th level x 4: Banishment, burning hands, flame strike, hellish rebuke, magic circle, scorching ray, scrying, stinking cloud, suggestion, wall of fire.
monster.abilities: Dark One's Own Luck (Recharges after a rest): When the warlock makes an ability check or saving throw, it can add a d10 to the roll. It can do this after the roll is made, but before the roll's effect's occur.
